summary: It is 1920. After three years of the Russian Civil War, communist government is finally established in Odessa. Young Alyosha Patrikeyv, who dreams of being a detective like Sherlock Holmes,... See full summary »
cast: Dmitriy Kharatyan|Borislav Brondukov|Aleksandr Demyanenko|Aleksandr Solovyov|Regimantas Adomaitis|Konstantin Grígoryev|Eduard Martsevich|Viktor Ilichyov|Ekaterina Durova|Lev Perfilov|Yuriy Dubrovin|Viktor Pavlovsky|Armen Dzhigarkhanyan|Oleg Fedulov
title: Zelyonyy furgon
